parquet.pig

Class PigSchemaConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • parquet.pig.PigSchemaConverter

  • public class PigSchemaConverter
extends Object
    Converts a Pig Schema into a Parquet schema Bags are converted into an optional group containing one repeated group field to preserve distinction between empty bag and null. Map are converted into an optional group containing one repeated group field of (key, value). anonymous fields are named field_{index}. (in most cases pig already gives them an alias val_{int}, so this rarely happens)
    Author:
    Julien Le Dem
